eu.aspire_fp7.adss.l2p

Class SecondLevelProtectionFinder2

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.aspire_fp7.adss.l2p.SecondLevelProtectionFinder2

  • public class SecondLevelProtectionFinder2
extends java.lang.Object
    Finds the second level protections and their relative data.
    Author:
    Leonardo Regano

      • generateGammaVariables

        public void generateGammaVariables(eu.aspire_fp7.adss.akb.ApplicationPart root)
                            throws ilog.concert.IloException
        Generate the gamma variables, for merging protection instantiations applied to contiguous regions.
        Parameters:
        root - Present for recursion purposes, pass null for complete generation.
        Throws:
        ilog.concert.IloException

      • generatePvariables

        public void generatePvariables()
                        throws ilog.concert.IloException
        Generates the p(i.j1.j2) variables, which state the precedence in the application of the protection instantiations j1 and j2 on the i application part. If p(i.j1.j2)=1, j1 is applied before j2, and p(i.j2.j1)=0. If both p(i.j1.j2) and p(i.j2.j1) are =0, at least one of the two protection instantiations are not applied to the application part i. For the annotated code regions, all the protection instantiations that are added by the second level protection finder must be subsequent of the first level protections, so the p variables are set accordingly.
        Throws:
        ilog.concert.IloException

      • generateXvariables

        public void generateXvariables()
                        throws ilog.concert.IloException
        Generates the x(i.j) variables, which state how many times the protection instantiation j must be applied to the application part i. The x variables regarding the code regions protected by first level protection are fixed with the corresponding value; also they are only generated for j indexes corresponding to protections that are not in the forbidden precedences of the first level protection instantiations applied to the application part. For singleton protections, for every couple application part - protection is generated a SOS1 so that only one protection instantiation of the same singleton protection can be applied to an application part.
        Throws:
        ilog.concert.IloException - if something goes wrong with the invocation of Cplex.

        public java.util.List<eu.aspire_fp7.adss.akb.ApplicationPart> findCodeRegions(java.lang.Integer depthLevel)
        Finds the code regions for which the second level protections will be inferred, and add them into the internal model as application parts.
        Parameters:
        depthLevel - The maximum level of nested code blocks to analyze, -1 for no limit.
        Returns:
        The code regions.
